name: Yum! Brands, Inc.
description: Yum! Brands, Inc. is a global leader in the quick-service restaurant industry, known for its iconic brands including Taco Bell, KFC, and Pizza Hut. Founded in 1997, the company has grown to operate in over 150 countries and territories, making it one of the largest restaurant companies in the world. Yum! Brands focuses on delivering quality food and exceptional dining experiences to its customers, offering a diverse menu that caters to local tastes. The company is committed to innovation in the food industry, regularly introducing new products and value meals that appeal to a wide range of consumers. Sustainability is also a key part of Yum!'s strategy, with initiatives aimed at reducing environmental impact and promoting responsible sourcing. With a strong franchise model, Yum! Brands empowers franchisees to operate their businesses while maintaining the core values and standards of their respective brands. The company is also heavily invested in technology, enhancing customer experiences through mobile ordering, delivery services, and digital engagement. Yum! Brands' mission is to build the world's most loved, trusted, and fastest-growing restaurant brands, ensuring they remain at the forefront of the industry.

seo.meta_title: Yum! Brands, Inc. | Leading Restaurant Company
seo.meta_description: Explore Yum! Brands, Inc., home to Taco Bell, KFC, and Pizza Hut. Discover our commitment to quality food, innovation, and sustainability.

faq.question: What brands does Yum! Brands own?
faq.answer: Yum! Brands owns Taco Bell, KFC, Pizza Hut, and several other brands.

faq.question: Where is Yum! Brands headquartered?
faq.answer: Yum! Brands is headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Yum! Brands?
faq.answer: David Gibbs is the CEO of Yum! Brands, Inc.
